Please try again Password Email Wallet Name Wallet Seed Enter Wallet Seed By creating a new wallet you agree to the WavesPlatform Terms of Service Create Wallet New Wallet Weak Regular Strong Normal I Understand Create Wallet - Notice

This feature involves the creation of a new account on Waves platform.

The procedure consists of complex cryptographic operations that use a SEED (a series of random words) to create a unique address for your account.

This SEED is extremely important and must be kept in safe place, since it\'s the only way to recover your account in case of lost, corrupted data or hardware failure.

Your SEED will also allow you to IMPORT your account to other devices.

NOTE: Make sure that you select the entire SEED length before keeping it. It\'s suggested to use the copy-to-clipboard button located the right side of the SEED box.

Apps that use screen overlays have the ability to trick you into tapping on unseen objects and potentially steal funds. Note that this warning will also be triggered by screen dimming apps. If you are confident that there is no threat you may continue. This item has been archived, and is unaccessible in the mobile app experience. Though you cannot send funds from this item, any funds will remain safe. Simply unarchive this item to start using it again. This item is not archived. Archive this item if you do NOT want to use it anymore. Your funds will remain safe, and you can unarchive it at anytime. Archive swept addresses? This item is set as your default and can\'t be archived. Extended Public Key Address Copy xpub Sharing your xPub authorizes others to track your transaction history. As authorized persons may be able to disrupt you from accessing your wallet, only share your xPub with people you trust. Assign a friendly display name. You specified an exceptionally small transaction fee of %1$s.\n\nYour transaction may become stuck and possibly never confirm. To increase the likelihood for your transaction to confirm within approximately one hour (6 blocks) we strongly recommend a fee of no less than %2$s. Verify Mobile Select Country We have sent your mobile phone an SMS message with a verification code. Enter the code to verify your mobile phone number. Code invalid, please try again Your mobile phone can be used to enable two-factor authentication, helping to secure your wallet from unauthorized access. Fingerprint Unlock 2-step Verification Block Tor Requests Would you like to block IP addresses that are known to be part of the Tor anonymizing network from accessing your wallet? The Tor network is frequently used by hackers attempting to access Blockchain users wallets. Password Hint Your Waves Wallet never communicates your password to our servers. This means we have no idea what your password is and we cannot reset it if you forget it. Create a memorable password hint that we can send to your verified email address in case you forget your password. Change Password Your password is never shared with our servers, which means we cannot help reset your password if you forget it. Make sure you write down your recovery phrase which can restore access to your wallet in the event of a lost password. We have sent your email address a verification link. Click the verification link to verify your email address. Email Notifications Current Password New Password Mobile number verified Preferences Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. You can choose to use your mobile phone number to secure your wallet. This code will be requested when you try to access your wallet via the web browser.\n\nIn order to use other authentication methods instead, please login to our web wallet. Backup your wallet seed words to ensure your money are safe in case you lose your phone. Backup Prevent unauthorized access to your wallet. Enable 2-Step Verification to increase wallet security. Wallet Seed For your security, Waves Wallet does not keep any passwords on file. The following 15 words seed will give you access to your funds in case you lose your password. Write it down on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere safe and secure. Start backup It is important to make sure you write down your words exactly and in that order as they appear in your seed. Backup Complete You can use your seed to restore your funds if you lose your password. Anyone with access to your seed can access your money so remember to keep it somewhere safe and secure. Backup again Backup confirmed Last backup: %1$s Enter the following words from your Recovery Phrase to complete the backup process. Filter Close Information Sorry, this feature will be available in the near future & Copied to clipboard Copied! or %sk %skk %skkk Loading… – Send feedback Unable to find market app Русский 中文(简体) 한국어 Türkçe English हिन्दी Dansk Nederlands Ru Zh Ko Tr En Hi Dn Nl Continue Confirm Change language Next I Understand Welcome to the Waves Platform! Please take some time to understand some important things for your own safety. 🙏 \n\nWe cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your backup phrase (aka SEED phrase).\n\nBy continuing to use our platform, you agree to accept all risks associated with the loss of your SEED, including but not limited to the inability to obtain your funds and dispose of them. In case you lose your SEED, you agree and acknowledge that the Waves Platform would not be responsible for the negative consequences of this. What you need to know about your SEED When registering your account, you will be asked to save your secret phrase (Seed) and to protect your account with a password. On normal centralized servers, special attention is paid to the password, which can be changed and reset via email, if the need arises. However, on decentralized platforms such as Waves, everything is arranged differently: You use your wallet anonymously, meaning your account is not connected to an email account or any other identifying data. Your password protects your account when working on a certain device or browser. It is needed in order to ensure that your secret phrase is not saved in storage. If you forget your password, you can easily create a new one by using the account recovery form via your secret phrase. If you lose your secret phrase, however, you will have no way to access your account. You cannot change your secret phrase. If you accidentally sent it to someone or suspect that scammers have taken it over, then create a new Waves wallet immediately and transfer your funds to it. How To Protect Yourself from Phishers One of the most common forms of scamming is phishing, which is when scammers create fake communities on Facebook or other websites that look similar to the authentic ones. Do not open emails or links from unknown senders. Regularly update your operating system. Use official security software. Do not install unknown software which could be hacked. Do not access your wallet when using public Wi-Fi or someone else’s device. Next Keep up with the latest news and articles, and find out all about events happening on the Waves Platform wavescommunity.com Whitepaper Terms and conditions Support Wavesplatform Join the Waves Community © Waves Platform Get Started with Blockchain Become part of a fast-growing area of the crypto world. You are the only person who can access your crypto assets. Wallet Store, manage and receive interest on your digital assets balance, easily and securely. Decentralised Exchange Trade quickly and securely. You retain complete control over your funds when trading them on our decentralised exchange. Token Launcher Issue your own tokens. These can be integrated into your business not only as an internal currency but also as a token for decentralised voting, as a rating system, or loyalty program. Create a new account Sign in to a saved account Import account via pairing code or manually New Account Account name Max: 20 symbols Name is required Account name already use Create a password at least 8 characters Confirm password Passwords do not match Continue Choose your address avatar This avatar is unique. You cannot change it later. Please select avatar No Backup, No Money You must save the secret phrase. It is crucial for accessing your account. Back Up Now Do it later Treat your backup phrase with care! Waves Platform would like to warn you about the increased frequency of scam and phishing attacks over the last month. Fraudsters are hiding their malware in their own versions of the Waves client and promising bonuses and discounts to lure in users.\n\nPlease be careful and never input your SEED into these \'clients\', because your account will be compromised and you will lose all of your funds.\n\nYou should ONLY use the official Waves client. The leased amount cannot be transferred or traded by you or anyone else. You can cancel a leasing transaction as soon as it appears in the blockchain which usually occurs in a minute or less. The generating balance will be updated after 1000 blocks.
